articles.title: Automatic campaigns execution
articles.desc: It is now possible to modify the next execution date of an automatic campaign after it started.

articles.title: File type custom field
articles.desc: It is now possible to download the file inserted in the file type custom field from the user edition page in the admin.

articles.title: Click tracking in emails
articles.desc: The click tracking in emails now handles the URLs with customised dynamic parameters.

articles.title: Planet Hoster compatibility
articles.desc: The way dynamic content and auto-save is handled has been modified to prevent false-positives from Planet Hoster's security rules.

articles.title: Automatic campaigns generation
articles.desc: A dedicated message has been added when automatic campaigns could not generate a new campaign.

articles.title: Multibyte characters handling
articles.desc: Multibyte characters (Japanese, Chinese, Arabic, Hebrew...) are now handled when wrapping text of an element inserted in an email.

articles.title: Bounce handling rules
articles.desc: The default bounce rules have been updated to catch more messages of blocked emails by filters.

articles.title: PHP 8.6 preparation
articles.desc: Modifications have been made to prepare for PHP 8.6.

articles.title: Unsubscribe page accessibility
articles.desc: We have improved the accessibility of the unsubscribe page.

articles.title: Front-end router improvements
articles.desc: The front-end router has been improved for the AcyMailing unsubscribe and online pages.

articles.title: Non-latin characters for user import
articles.desc: Better handling of email addresses with non-latin characters in the domain part when importing users.

articles.title: More article custom fields possibilities
articles.desc: The article custom fields can now be used in custom views when inserting articles in an email.

articles.title: EasySocial links handling
articles.desc: We added SEF handling for the EasySocial links.

articles.title: Front-end campaign edition
articles.desc: An issue has been fixed on the front-end campaign edition for the latest version of Joomla 6.

articles.title: Falang integration for multilingual
articles.desc: The integration with Falang for inserted articles now correctly auto-detects the language when the multilingual option is active along with the language filter plugin.

articles.title: RSEventsPro grouping
articles.desc: Grouping events by featured status has been fixed for RSEventsPro.

articles.title: RSEventsPro events insertion
articles.desc: The insertion of RSEventsPro events by category in emails has been fixed when no settings are available on the categories.

articles.title: Joomla CLI installation
articles.desc: The installation via Joomla CLI has been fixed.

articles.title: Integrations with empty descriptions
articles.desc: The integrations for DOCman and JSW CRM now correctly handle items with empty descriptions.

articles.title: WooCommerce product insertion
articles.desc: We fixed an error message preventing last product insertion in the editor for WooCommerce.

articles.title: User auto-creation
articles.desc: The new account registration could lead to an error in some cases when the auto user creation was active.

articles.title: WooCommerce follow-up campaigns
articles.desc: Fixed the default values for the products and categories options in order based follow-up

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Mail-Tester integration
articles.desc: We changed the integration with Mail-Tester due to their new version, the spam test is now working again.

articles.title: Notification messages
articles.desc: An issue has been fixed when notification messages are configured to be sent to a non existing user and that user could not be automatically added.

articles.title: Special characters in email addresses
articles.desc: The special characters option for email addresses was not working as intended, special characters are now correctly rejected when a new user is created.

articles.title: Styling for category titles
articles.desc: The editor styling is now correctly applied to the category title when inserting items by category in emails and grouping by category.

articles.title: Automations and scenarios ordering
articles.desc: The automations and scenarios ordering has been fixed on listings.

articles.title: Firefox fixes
articles.desc: On firefox, the plugins card are now correctly displayed and not mirrored.

articles.title: Redirection after email edition
articles.desc: We fixed the redirection issue that could occur after a cancel or a save and exit in the email edition from the configuration page.

articles.title: Subscription forms messages
articles.desc: We fixed issues that could cause errors in some subscription forms and on automation configurations.

articles.title: Automation summary
articles.desc: A special case has been handled on the automation summary.

articles.title: Custom fields display
articles.desc: We fixed some custom fields in the subscriber edition page that were not allowing you to empty their value.

articles.title: Bounce handling
articles.desc: We fixed a deprecated warning that could occur when you manually triggered bounce handling.

articles.title: GIF block
articles.desc: Google has disabled Tenor, their GIF integration API. The GIF block has been updated to use the Giphy API instead.

articles.title: reCaptcha v3
articles.desc: The integration with the reCaptcha v3 has been fixed for forms that were submitted with a page reload.

articles.title: Scenario performance page
articles.desc: The display of the right panel in the scenario performance page has been fixed

articles.title: Subscription forms for license downgrade
articles.desc: We fixed an issue that caused unintended behavior when you had a subscription form and downgraded your license from the Enterprise version.
